content.html: @bascht If that’s scientific then you will be able to provide reproducible sources restating that ‘running a leafblower for 30 minutes creates more emissions than driving a F-150 pickup truck 3800 miles.’ otherwise we can cherry pick studies showing that global warming is not man made and claim they are scientific.
content.text: @bascht If that’s scientific then you will be able to provide reproducible sources restating that ‘running a leafblower for 30 minutes creates more emissions than driving a F-150 pickup truck 3800 miles.’ otherwise we can cherry pick studies showing that global warming is not man made and claim they are scientific.
